```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
#set the working directory for throughout the entire markdown file:
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = "")
```

This is a blank template for starting an Rmarkdown file, it may or may not save time because you can just copy this file instead of deleting all the stuff about cars everytime.

## Load the Libraries
```{r}
#some common libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
```
